name: 2021 6th International Conference on Biomedical Imaging, Signal Processing
content: Paper Publicationï¼š Conference Proceedings by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8581-7): archived in ACM Digital Library, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699): indexed by Scopus (since 2021), Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, IndexCopernicus, etc. Publishing principle: no plagiarism. All plagiarized articles will not be accepted. The official language of the conference is English, and only English submissions are accepted.
